text: Américo de Deus Rodrigues Tomás (; 19 November 1894 – 18 September 1987) was a Portuguese Navy officer and politician who was the authoritarian 13th President of Portugal from 1958 to 1974. ==References== Category:1894 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Presidents of Portugal Category:Portuguese military people Category:Generals
title: Américo Tomás
